exceptions.exn: In environment b_nat : nat Hb_nat : 2 <= b_nat n : nat H_eq : b_nat = 2 H : forall n m : nat, 0 <= m -> n * m = 1 -> n = 1 Unable to unify "?M1498 = 1" with "n = (fix alpha_nat (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | 1 => 1 | S (S r as p) => 2 * alpha_nat p - alpha_nat r end) n".

original: intros H_eq. unfold alpha_nat. rewrite H_eq. intro. symmetry. apply Nat.eq_mul_1_nonneg'; auto.
